p: The total DNA of the plant leaves was extracted using a Plant Genomic DNA kit (Dingguo, Beijing, China), and the concentration and quality of the DNA were detected using a Nanodrop 2000 spectrophotometer (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA), followed by verification by 1.2% agarose gel electrophoresis. The extracted DNA samples were stored in a refrigerator at −20 °C for later use.
